description:
International Women's Day (IWD) was on the 8th as well as it being Women's History Month- so why not continue celebrating and come along to an evening of networking and inspiring talks from female tech professionals in Bristol?

H﻿osted at Bristol-based tech firm, Signable, this event shares the IWD 2023 theme that is #DareToBe and is an opportunity to ask the questions you've always wondered about making it in tech.

What will you dare to be this year?

Speakers on our panel include:

A﻿nna Loveridge - Digital Designer and Freelance Yoga Facilitator
K﻿aren Velasquez - Lead Product Manager @ Signable
Edith-Clare Hall - Engineer & PhD Student in Robotics @ Uni of Bristol

T﻿he organiser and host of the event is Emily Cook, Technical Product Manager @ Signable.

A﻿s the local of chapter of Google Developer-led Women Techmakers, Bristol Techmakers is a new community aimed at empowering women to thrive in tech with a focus on wellbeing and Bristol as a tech city.

Agenda

5:30 PM:

Arrival \| Snacks and Drinks

6:00 PM:

Introduction \| Bristol Techmakers & Signable

6:30 PM:

#DareToBe Panel Discussion

7:00 PM:

Networking

Complete your event RSVP here: [https://www.eventbrite.co.uk/e/daretobe-women-in-tech-panel-signable-tickets-577165095337](https://www.eventbrite.co.uk/e/daretobe-women-in-tech-panel-signable-tickets-577165095337)
title: #DareToBe Women in Tech Panel @ Signable
